name: Dead Doodles
description:
Survive in this drawn zombie world! Features:
  • 4 Original Music Tracks
  • Hand-made textures
  • Self-made sounds
  • Hidden extras
Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • R - Reload
  • Space - Accept (Next dialogue)
  • Left-Click - Shoot
  • (Hold) Left Click - Auto fire
  • Escape - Pause
Notice: 

Please note that Dead Doodles might not always get consistently timed updates and might have loads of issues and bugs. If you do find bugs, please make a post in the discussion board. 

- Contains pixelated blood, references to death, suicide, and depression.
